doc: /** Compute composition of a derivative structure by a function. * @param operand array holding the operand * @param operandOffset offset of the operand in its array * @param f array of value and derivatives of the function at * the current point (i.e. at {@code operand[operandOffset]}). * @param result array where result must be stored (for * composition the result array cannot be the input * array) * @param resultOffset offset of the result in its array */
